articles.content:
Seems like its a denim day for the Johars! Instead of dropping a Lockdown with Johars episode clip, Karan Johar shared a photo on his Instagram story.

articles.description: Vidya Balan pulled her Shakuntala Devi co-star Jisshu Sengupta’s leg during a recent Instagram live session and joked that he ‘showed attitude’ to her when they first met.
articles.content:
